title: Jet GHB-1340A 13″ × 40″ Geared-Head Bench Lathe
item_description:
• Make: Jet
  • Model: GHB-1340A geared-head bench lathe (13″ swing × 40″ between centers)
  • Overall Dimensions (with stand):
    • Length: 71″
    • Width: 32″
    • Height: 45″
  • Net Weight: 856 lb (crate weight 1,155 lb)
  • Motor: 2 HP, 220 V, single-phase, 60 Hz (enclosed gearbox, smooth quiet operation)
  • Swing Over Bed: 13″
  • Swing Over Cross Slide: 7-25/32″
  • Swing Over Gap: 18″ - Gap Length: 8″
  • Distance Between Centers: 40″
  • Spindle Bore: 1-3/8″ - Spindle Nose: D1-4 cam-lock
  • Spindle Taper (with sleeve): MT-5 / MT-3
  • Spindle Speeds: 12 speeds, 80 - 1,200 RPM
  • Feeds: 35 longitudinal & cross feeds, 0.0018 - 0.0374 in/rev
  • Threads (Inch): 38 choices, 3 - 72 TPI
  • Threads (Metric): 21 choices, 0.45 - 10 mm pitch
  • Compound Slide Travel: 2-11⁄16″
  • Cross Slide Travel: 6-5⁄16″ - Carriage Travel: 35″
  • Tailstock Taper: MT-3 - Quill Travel: 4″
  • Steady Rest Capacity: 2-5⁄8″ - Follow Rest Capacity: 2-3⁄4″
  • Bed Width: 7-3⁄8″ induction-hardened V-way design
  • Standard Equipment Included:
    • 6″ 3-jaw direct-mount chuck (with top-reversing jaws)
    • 8″ 4-jaw independent chuck
    • 12″ faceplate
    • Four-way tool post, 5⁄8″ tool capacity
    • Steady rest & follow rest (mounted)
    • Splash guard & full-length chip/splash tray
    • Centers (dead) & headstock center sleeve (MT-3, MT-5/3)
    • Metric change-gear set (m = 1.25; z = 33, 44, 46, 48, 52)
    • Tool box: Phillips & flat screwdrivers, open-end & hex wrenches, shear pins, chuck key, cam-lock key, tool-post wrench, oil gun, paint, spare parts
    • Operator’s manual, warranty card, parts list, pre-shipment checklist, test record, packing list, oil pan, lifting hooks
